languages.text: "Я не буду обсуждать этот вопрос здесь и сейчас. Я поймал тебя за руку, творящую темный ритуал! Не тебе разглагольствовать о пуританстве, Эмелина!"
"I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."
languages.original_text: "Я не буду обсуждать этот вопрос здесь и сейчас. Я поймал тебя за руку, творящую темный ритуал! Не тебе разглагольствовать о пуританстве, Эмелина!"

traits.locale_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我这种时候可不想和你讨论这些事情。你在举行黑暗仪式，被我抓了个正着，艾米莉娜！你没有资格抨击纯净派人士。”
languages.original_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."

traits.locale_text: “我这种时候可不想和你讨论这些事情。你在举行黑暗仪式，被我抓了个正着，艾米莉娜！你没有资格抨击清教派人士。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No hablaré de eso ahora. ¡Te he descubierto realizando un ritual oscuro, Emelina! No estás en posición de criticar el puritanismo».
languages.original_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."

traits.locale_text: «No hablaré de eso ahora. ¡Te he descubierto realizando un ritual oscuro, Emelina! No estás en posición de criticar el puritanismo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「今はそれについては話すつもりはありません。我はあなたが暗黒の儀式を行っている姿を見たのです、エメリナさん。あなたは純潔主義を非難する立場にありません」
languages.original_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."

traits.locale_text: 「今はそれについては話すつもりはありません。我はあなたが暗黒の儀式を行っている姿を見たのです、エメリナさん。あなたは純潔主義を非難する立場にありません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Le moment est mal choisi pour aborder ce sujet. Je vous ai surprise en train d'effectuer un rituel hérétique, Emelina ! Vous êtes mal placée pour pester contre le puritanisme. »
languages.original_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."

traits.locale_text: « Le moment est mal choisi pour aborder ce sujet. Je vous ai surprise en train d'effectuer un rituel hérétique, Emelina ! Vous êtes mal placée pour pester contre le puritanisme. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das werde ich hier und jetzt nicht diskutieren. Ich habe Euch bei einem dunklen Ritual ertappt, Emelina! Ihr seid nicht in der Position, gegen Puritanismus zu wettern."
languages.original_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."

traits.locale_text: "Das werde ich hier und jetzt nicht diskutieren. Ich habe Euch bei einem dunklen Ritual ertappt, Emelina! Ihr seid nicht in der Position, gegen Puritanismus zu wettern."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu şu anda tartışmayacağım. Seni karanlık bir ayin gerçekleştirirken yakaladım Emelina! Püritenliği eleştirebilecek konumda değilsin."
languages.original_text: "I will not discuss that here and now. I caught you performing a dark ritual, Emelina! You are in no position to rail against puritanism."

traits.locale_text: "Burada ve şu anda bunu tartışmayacağım. Seni karanlık bir ayin gerçekleştirirken yakaladım Emelina! Püritenliği eleştirebilecek bir pozisyonda değilsin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
